items.name: BearHug Swim Bottom Skin
items.description:
You can use this to skin the appearance of pants into swim trunks on men or a bikini bottom on women.

Guess that grumpy bruin was hoping for some honey.

items.name: Odd Couple Swim Bottom Skin
items.description:
You can use this to skin the appearance of pants into swim trunks on men or a bikini bottom on women.

They say true love sees but doesn't mind. Good for them!

items.name: Sauropod Heart Swim Bottom Skin
items.description:
You can use this to skin the appearance of pants into swim trunks on men or a bikini bottom on women.

When they form that heart shape, you just feel the love.

items.name: BearHug Swim Top Skin
items.description:
You can use this to skin the appearance of a shirt into a bare chest on men or a bikini top on women.

Love might bear all things, but all bears don't love everything.

items.name: Odd Couple Swim Top Skin
items.description:
You can use this to skin the appearance of a shirt into a bare chest on men or a bikini top on women.

Who are we to deny their love? The heart wants what it wants.

items.name: Sauropod Heart Swim Top Skin
items.description:
You can use this to skin the appearance of a shirt into a bare chest on men or a bikini top on women.

Don't you love it when they curve like that?

items.name: "Self Hug" Emote
items.description:
Consume this to permanently unlock the "Self Hug" emote.

Remember, your survival depends on loving yourself.

items.name: Festive Dino Candy
items.description: A unique candy with a curious effect that few dino's can passover.

items.name: Apex Boss Tribute
items.description: Use this to tame a Primal Fear Apex Boss
